properties.value: The gap is an Agility obstacle found within the Agility Pyramid. An Agility level of 30 is required to pass the obstacle, which will then grant the player Agility experience. Failing the obstacle will send the player to a lower level.

The gap is an Agility obstacle found within the Agility Pyramid. An Agility level of 30 is required to pass the obstacle, which will then grant the player Agility experience. Failing the obstacle will send the player to a lower level.

The '''gap''' is an [[Agility]] obstacle found within the [[Agility Pyramid]]. An Agility level of 30 is required to pass the obstacle, which will then grant the player Agility experience. Failing the obstacle will send the player to a lower level.

==Agility info==
{{Agility info
|version1 = Cross
|version2 = Jump
|name1 = Gap (Cross)
|name2 = Gap (Jump)
|level = 30
|xp1 = 56.4
|xp2 = 22
|course = [[Agility Pyramid]]
|type = Obstacle
}}
